original_text: Let his children be continually vagabonds, and beg: let them seek their bread also out of their desolate places.
korean_text: 그의 자녀들은 유리하며 구걸하고 그들의 황폐한 집을 떠나 빌어먹게 하소서

sentences.original_text: Let his children be continually vagabonds
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 자녀들이 계속해서 떠돌이가 되게 하라

sentences.original_text: let them seek their bread also
